article_title: Patz Trial Nears End as Defense Wraps Up
article_text:
As closing statements began in the trial of a man accused of murdering 6-year-old Etan Patz, the defense attorney urged jurors not to believe the words of the only alleged witness to the crime—the defendant himself.

Attorney Harvey Fishbein made that pitch Monday in Manhattan’s Supreme Court to a jury that has sat through 10 weeks of evidence in...
